title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3210/86 of 22 October 1986 fixing for the 1986/87 marketing year the reference prices for cabbage lettuce
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3210/86
of 22 October 1986
fixing for the 1986/87 marketing year the reference prices for cabbage lettuce
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 October 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President

(2) OJ No L 119, 8. 5. 1986, p. 46.
